name: Omitl
description:
Omitl is a fast paced action fighting game based on Aztec sacrifices. Defeat skeletons and build up to fight the evil eye of Tezcatlipoca.

Instructions
  • WASD to move
  • Space to spawn in skeletons
  • Click to attack
Tools
  • Engine - Unity
  • Art - Krita
  • Music - Antti Luode
Links
  • Newgrounds
  • Ludum Dare
